original_text: So the Lord says this: ‘Because of your sins, I will speak against you in court. I will show that you are guilty, as well as your children and your grandchildren. korean_text: 그러므로 내가 다시 싸우고 너희 자손들과도 싸우리라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: I will speak against you in court
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 법정에서 너희를 반대하여 말할 것이다

sentences.original_text: I will show that you are guilty
